dialogStrings:
{Aeris}
“This is…the Temple of the Ancients…”{PAUSE}“I…I know…
I feel it…
The knowledge of the Ancients…floating…”

{Aeris}
“You could become one with the Planet,
but you're stopping it
with the strength of will.”{PAUSE}“For the future?
For us?”

{Cloud}
“What are you saying?
Do you understand?”

“Because I'm here?
I'm sorry…I don't understand.”

{Barret}
“It says number 9.
He has a tattoo on his neck.”

{Yuffie}
“He has a tattoo too!
Ummm, I think it's number 9.”

{Cid}
“Hey, he's got a tattoo.
It says number 9.”
